title: Well Riot, you've done it. You killed Ezreal mid.
body: After half a decade, I am forced to part ways with my love. When you nerfed his Q base damage that was it. It's been a long time coming, the ult nerf made him bad, but playable. But now the demon of wave clear that has always lured over him as finally put him down this time. I know any Red reading this will not give a shit, I know the boards will not give a shit. But I give lots of shits.

replies.body: He shouldn’t go mid. If it’s viable, it’s too toxic to play against.
funny definition of toxic... ezreal is the same in any lane hes played, a poke damage at best who can force an enemy team to gank or lose lane pressure  and at worse he is just useless
Now if we could just [permanently] kill Ezreal bot Id never have to see this annoying champion ever again.
